JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Antenna team for mobile tele installation in Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
If you are an experienced antenna team or individual, look here. You now have the opportunity to get a job in a company with good team spirit, where the manager is not far away. We strive to be the best in the business and you have the unique opportunity to be part of a team that makes a difference.

Today we are the most preferred supplier in the market. Therefore this position is not something you get, it is something you have to earn. KM Telecom has achieved this position, due to a dedicated team of skilled employees, who want to be the best.

Installation of telecommunications equipment throughout the country Projects are spread throughout the country. They can vary greatly time and scope, and include; setup, assembly, and service. You work with a deadline, but you control when you complete underlying assignments. Our projects involve:

  • Mounting/replacing antennas (working at heights)
  • Cable routing and -testing
  • Installation- and integration of telecommunication’s equipment
  • Installation of steel structures
  • Electrical-, grounding- and alarm installation
  • Quality compliance and testing

When you are appointed a project, you will be responsible from start to finish. Of course, you have a technical support team and experienced colleagues ready to help, but you need to come up with solutions on the spot. You, of course, are equipped with the skills to take on the above, and we make sure that you will receive the necessary training if not – before and during. We want you to always feel challenged and motivated in your work. This is something we know makes happy customers and a good atmosphere in our company, because we have very low sick leave and virtually no staff replacement.

You have an electrical engineering background You are probably an electrician and/or have a background with similar responsibilities. You want an everyday life with a good combination of physical assembly work and technical installations. In addition, you must:

  • Put safety and quality first
  • Be able to make decisions on your own
  • It will be an advantage if you speak and write English. We also speak Danish and Polish.
  • Have knowledge of IT because documentation and order processing are managed via PC.
  • You have driving license for car

Please submit application and C.V. at job@km-telecom.com
